title: I click the "reconnect" but nothing happens, how do I fix that?
body: I am fine up until I am supposed to hit the loading screen before a game. The loading screen never shows up and the reconnect button is there. But when I click the reconnect button nothing happens. I need a solution FAST because it is getting really annoying. I already deleted my League of Legends off the computer and re-downloaded it. And of course I tried to close it and re-open it too. Can someone please help me?

replies.body: Had this happen to me. Reinstalling League worked for me.

It sounds like something is impeding your ability to reach our gameservers. To ensure this isn't caused by incompatible local network settings, I recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) in its entirety.

Please let me know if this resolved your issues.
